de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder

Class AbstractBuilder<Type,BuilderType extends AbstractBuilder<Type,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractBuilder<Type,BuilderType>
  • Type Parameters:
    Type - The type of the class, which is created by the builder
    BuilderType - The type of the builder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractMaterialDialogBuilder, DialogAnimation.AbstractDialogAnimationBuilder, DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractBuilder<Type,BuilderType extends AbstractBuilder<Type,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract base class for all builders.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractBuilder(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a new builder.

      Returns the class, which is configured by the builder.

      The method, which is invoked on subclasses in order to create the class, which is configured by the builder.

      Returns the builder itself, casted to the generic type BuilderType.
